text: General elections were held in Uruguay on 27 October 2024. Since no presidential candidate won a majority in the first round of voting, a runoff took place on 24 November 2024. Former Canelones Department Intendant Yamandú Orsi of the Broad Front beat former Senator Álvaro Delgado of the Republican Coalition in the run-off by a 52% to 47% margin. ==References== Category:21st century in Uruguay Category:2024 in South America Category:2024 elections Category:Elections in Uruguay Category:October 2024 events Category:November 2024 events
title: 2024 Uruguayan general election
